column4: Could someone please help me get my Microsoft (gasp!, it was cheap) Wireless Laser Desktop 4000 working?  Everything appears to work fine except for the middle mouse button... the wheel works fine, though.  Also, if you have info on how to configure the extra keys, I would accept that :)
ha.  not with that nick.   heh, nah, no idea, sorry.
My nick is that threatening to you, huh?  Fascinating.  Thanks for the commentary.
